context: Krish le 15 suntala kharid gare ra Maya le 10 suntala kharid gari. Donubanda kati suntala miley?
response: Krish le 15 suntala ra Maya le 10 suntala kharid gare. Donubanda 15 + 10 = 25 suntala miley.

context: Ramesh sanga 20 syau thiyo. Usle 8 syau khaayo. Aba ussanga kati syau bacha?
response: Ramesh sanga 20 syau thiyo, usle 8 syau khaayo. Aba ussanga 20 - 8 = 12 syau bacha.

context: Ek mahinama ek din 5 kitab padhne vyakti le kati kitab padcha? Ek mahina 30 din ko thiyo.
response: Ek din 5 kitab padhcha, ani 30 din ma 5 x 30 = 150 kitab padcha.

context: Shyam le 48 laddu banayo. Usle 6 saathiharulai barabar banai diye. Prati saathiko share kati ho?
response: 48 laddu 6 saathiharulai barabar banai diye, ta prati saathiko share 48 ÷ 6 = 8 ho.

context: Hari sanga 18 aam, Tara sanga 12 aam cha. Hari le Tara lai 6 aam diyo. Donu sanga barabar aam bhayo ki nai?
response: Hari le Tara lai 6 aam diyo, ta Hari sanga 18 - 6 = 12 aam ra Tara sanga 12 + 6 = 18 aam cha. Donu ko aam barabar bhayena.

instruction: Donu sankhya ko jod nikaalnu hos.
context: Raju sanga 12 aam cha ra Shyam sanga 8 aam cha. Donu sanga kati aam cha?
response: Raju sanga 12 aam ra Shyam sanga 8 aam cha. Donu sanga 12 + 8 = 20 aam cha.

context: Sita sanga 25 kitaab thiyo. Usle 7 kitaab pharkaayo. Aba ussanga kati kitaab cha?
response: Sita sanga 25 kitaab thiyo, usle 7 kitaab pharkaayo. Aba ussanga 25 - 7 = 18 kitaab cha.

context: Ek din ma ek vyakti le 6 kitaab padcha. 5 din ma kati kitaab padhcha?
response: Ek din ma 6 kitaab padcha. 5 din ma 6 x 5 = 30 kitaab padcha.

context: Ramesh le 48 laddu banayo. Usle 8 saathiharulai barabar banai diye. Prati saathiko share kati ho?
response: 48 laddu 8 saathiharulai barabar banai diye, ta prati saathiko share 48 ÷ 8 = 6 ho.

context: Hari sanga 18 aam cha, Tara sanga 12 aam cha. Hari le Tara lai 6 aam diyo. Donu sanga barabar aam cha ki nai?
response: Hari le Tara lai 6 aam diyo. Aba Hari sanga 18 - 6 = 12 aam ra Tara sanga 12 + 6 = 18 aam cha. Donu ko aam barabar cha.

context: Krishna le 20 rupaiya ra Laxmi le 15 rupaiya jodera rakhe. Donu sanga kati rupaiya bhayo?
response: Krishna le 20 rupaiya ra Laxmi le 15 rupaiya rakhe. Donu sanga 20 + 15 = 35 rupaiya bhayo.

context: Ek mahinama ek din 4 kilaa khane vyakti le 30 din ma kati kilaa khancha?
response: Ek din ma 4 kilaa khane vyakti 30 din ma 4 x 30 = 120 kilaa khancha.

context: Sangita le 56 laddulai 7 saathiharulai barabar banai diyo. Prati saathiko share kati ho?
response: 56 laddu 7 saathiharulai barabar banai diye, ta prati saathiko share 56 ÷ 7 = 8 ho.

context: Ek thailama 15 aam cha ra arko thailama 15 aam cha. Donu thailama aam barabar cha ki nai?
response: Donu thailama 15 aam cha. Tyesaile aam barabar cha.

context: Babu le 40 rupees diyo. Rajesh le 12 rupees kharcha garyo. Aba ussanga kati rupaiya bacha?
response: 40 rupees ma bata 12 rupees kharcha garyo. Aba 40 - 12 = 28 rupees bacha.

context: Ek din ma 9 rupa ma kitaab bechne vyakti le 6 din samma kati rupaiya kamaune ho?
response: Ek din ma 9 rupaiya kamaune vyakti le 6 din ma 9 x 6 = 54 rupaiya kamaune ho.

context: Prajwal le 100 laddulai 10 thailama rakhe. Prati thailama kati laddu cha?
response: 100 laddulai 10 thailama rakhe, ta prati thailama 100 ÷ 10 = 10 laddu cha.

context: Ek balak sanga 45 rupees cha ra usle arkai sanga 25 rupees liyo. Aba ussanga kati rupees cha?
response: 45 rupees ra arkai sanga 25 rupees liyo, ta 45 + 25 = 70 rupees cha.

context: Ek byakti sanga 30 aam cha. Usle 12 aam khayo. Aba ussanga kati aam bacha?
response: 30 aam ma bata 12 aam khayo. Aba 30 - 12 = 18 aam bacha.

instruction: Samanata check garera uttar dinu hos.
context: Shyam le 20 aam ra Tara le 20 aam liyo. Donubanda aam barabar cha ki nai?
response: Shyam le 20 aam ra Tara le 20 aam liyo. Donu ko aam barabar cha.

context: Suresh le 7 kitaab padhe ra Anil le 13 kitaab padhe. Donubanda kati kitaab padhe?
response: Suresh le 7 kitaab ra Anil le 13 kitaab padhe, ta donubanda 7 + 13 = 20 kitaab padhe.

context: Ek vyakti le ek din 10 ghanta kaam garcha. 15 din samma kati ghanta kaam garne ho?
response: Ek din ma 10 ghanta kaam garne vyakti le 15 din ma 10 x 15 = 150 ghanta kaam garne ho.

context: Manoj le 81 laddu banayo ra 9 saathiharulai barabar banai diye. Prati saathiko share kati ho?
response: 81 laddu 9 saathiharulai barabar banai diye, ta prati saathiko share 81 ÷ 9 = 9 ho.

context: Ramesh le 35 rupees kamaayo. Usle 20 rupees kharcha garyo. Aba ussanga kati rupees bacha?
response: 35 rupees ma bata 20 rupees kharcha garyo. Aba 35 - 20 = 15 rupees bacha.

context: Ek bhanda 12 kitaab cha ra arkai bhanda 12 kitaab cha. Donu kitaab ko sankhya barabar cha ki nai?
response: Ek bhanda 12 kitaab cha ra arkai bhanda 12 kitaab cha. Donu kitaab ko sankhya barabar cha.

context: Hari sanga 14 aam cha ra Tara sanga 11 aam cha. Donubanda kati aam cha?
response: Hari sanga 14 aam ra Tara sanga 11 aam cha. Donubanda 14 + 11 = 25 aam cha.

context: Ek vyakti le 50 rupees kamaayo ra 20 rupees kharcha garyo. Aba kati rupees bacha?
response: 50 rupees kamaayo ra 20 rupees kharcha garyo. Aba 50 - 20 = 30 rupees bacha.

context: Ek din ma ek vyakti 8 kilaa kaam garcha. 10 din samma kati kilaa kaam garcha?
response: Ek din ma 8 kilaa kaam garcha. 10 din ma 8 x 10 = 80 kilaa kaam garcha.

context: Ek vyakti le 60 laddu banayo ra 5 saathiharulai barabar banai diye. Prati saathiko share kati ho?
response: 60 laddu 5 saathiharulai barabar banai diye, ta prati saathiko share 60 ÷ 5 = 12 ho.

context: Sita le 22 kitaab ra Prakash le 18 kitaab padhe. Donubanda kati kitaab padhe?
response: Sita le 22 kitaab ra Prakash le 18 kitaab padhe, ta donubanda 22 + 18 = 40 kitaab padhe.

context: Ramesh sanga 70 rupees thiyo. Usle 30 rupees kharcha garyo. Aba ussanga kati rupees bacha?
response: 70 rupees ma bata 30 rupees kharcha garyo. Aba 70 - 30 = 40 rupees bacha.

context: Ek din ma 7 kilometer walk garne vyakti le 12 din samma kati kilometer walk garcha?
response: Ek din ma 7 kilometer walk garne vyakti le 12 din ma 7 x 12 = 84 kilometer walk garcha.

context: Prajwal le 96 laddulai 8 thailama rakhe. Prati thailama kati laddu cha?
response: 96 laddulai 8 thailama rakhe, ta prati thailama 96 ÷ 8 = 12 laddu cha.

context: Ramesh le 35 aam ra Sita le 15 aam kharid gari. Donubanda kati aam cha?
response: Ramesh le 35 aam ra Sita le 15 aam kharid gari, ta donubanda 35 + 15 = 50 aam cha.

context: Ek thailama 25 aam cha ra arko thailama 30 aam cha. Donu thailama aam barabar cha ki nai?
response: Ek thailama 25 aam cha ra arko thailama 30 aam cha. Donu aam barabar chaena.
